keys.value: Elite Tempering Stone

Tempers an item up to +20 max. <It_G> - Tempers up +1-3 levels at 100% chance.</It_G> <It_G> - Tempering can be boosted up to the max. level.</It_G> <It_G> - Right-click, then select an equipment to temper.</It_G>
Heroic Tempering Stone

Enhances the attributes of the item at a temper level higher than +20 up to 21 -25. <It_G> - Tempers up +1-3 levels at 100% chance.</It_G> <It_G> - Tempering can be boosted up to the max. level.</It_G> <It_G> - Right-click, then select an equipment to temper</It_G>

Tempera um equipamento até +25 para aprimorar seus atributos.
Não pode ser usado para têmpera de itens 10 níveis acima do nível do seu personagem.
Clique com o botão direito do mouse e, então, selecione um equipamento para temperar.

Fellow: Word without name

The specialty beer of the Quenching Inn. The carbonation and savory fragrance that makes the skin thrilled are excellent. Even though it is beer, it has a high alcohol content, so it becomes difficult to control your body the moment you drink it.

Golden dew, one of the five famous products of Magmaphora. It is called Golden Dew because gold goes into it like crazy. It is shining brightly like sunlight. With a sweet and spicy scent, it is full of refreshing feeling, and just holding it, you can smell the flowers all over your body. Its only drawback is that it evaporates into the air within an hour.
Dew that becomes golden dew. It is called yellow dew. Taste is better than beer. It sells more expensive than beer, but the loss is the same. It evaporates over time due to the heat of magmaphora.
Failed Golden Dew. It smells fishy and horrible, so I can't eat it. Let's throw it away. It evaporates over time due to the heat of magmaphora.
The wet book by Martitle and Matthew. The loosely tied shape is just ominous. You can attempt to tame <UI_G>Martitl</UI_G> by making it daunting.
It contains an antidote that can detoxify demonic energy. You can try taming <UI_G>Laserta Kompano</UI_G>.
It emits strong light to become one with the main body. You can try taming <UI_G>Illusion Fragment Rayol</UI_G>.
It is said that Ignaves show their most beautiful feathers to their partner when courting. You can try taming <UI_G>Ignaves</UI_G>.

Magma Cream

A magma cream made by the Rubrom Association for rubrom whose skin keeps peeling off due to dryness. It is also popular with wild Rubroms to the extent that you can get close to them by applying it. It is said that the lifespan of Rubroms has increased since the product was released. If you have it, you can tame <UI_G>Lubrom</UI_G>.
Title: 9th anniversary
A title obtained as a reward for clearing the 9th anniversary content
Pet: Rofus

Special Grilling
Special grilling, one of the five delicacies of Magmapora. It's not easy to get the recipe, but the taste is said to be beyond imagination.
Special Soup
A special soup that is one of the five delicacies of Magmapora. It's not easy to get the recipe, but the taste is said to be beyond imagination.
Miracle Necklace
It is an inorganic substance that should be cold, but it emits a soft warm light. I think I can calm Beatus down and tame him.
Illusion Necklace

A replica of a necklace that has already played its part. The effect isn't strong, but I think it can be used to tame Beatus in a phantom state. If you have it, you can tame <UI_G>Cursed Beatus</UI_G> and <UI_G>Crimson Beatus</UI_G>.
Toy Storage Key
The key to open the toy locker that <UI_G>Lavigny</UI_G>, who loved toys, hid in the Charles Palace (Legend) (Count's librarian).
Dogbox Key
<UI_G>The key to open the toy locker that Lavini</UI_G>, who loved playing house, hid tightly in the Charlesan Mansion (Legend) (Mansion Banquet Hall).
